Package it.polimi.se2019.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    Class to handle the generation of colored strings.
    DamageDone
    Data structure that helps with counting players and damage done on damage boards.
    GameConstants
    Contains all the constants of the game.
    ImmutableListWithDefaultValue<E>
    Implements an immutable list: once instantiated, the list cannot be modified.
    ImmutableListWithDefaultValueTest  
    LeaderboardSlot
    Class that represents position in a leaderboard.
    MacroAction
    This class contains all the information to execute an action, and it does so by splitting it into atomic actions.
    MacroActionBuilder
    The job of this class is to generate a new MacroAction.
    Pair<E,F>
    Simple pair of two elements of types E and F.
    PlayerRepPosition
    Class that represents a sharable version of the leaderboard.
    QuestionContainer
    Class that contains a question and the possible answers.
    ServerConfig
    Class that contains the configuration of the server.
    SingleTimer
    Implements a timer with the isRunning() method.
    Utils
    Contains general utilities for the program.
    UtilsTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActionType
    Enum containing all the possible actions a player can make.
    CardinalDirection
    Enum containing the 4 cardinal directions in a bi-dimensional space.
    Color.BackgroundColorType
    Background colors.
    Color.CharacterColorType
    Character colors.
    GameConstants.MapType
